channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/MonroeCountyWV911/

item.title: Do to the national weather tropical storm Debby, they are sa
item.description: Do to the national weather tropical storm Debby, they are saying it will be here this afternoon. Flood watch expanded west to the southeast part of West Virginia. High risk of excessive rainfall, expanded east into the piedmont. Main threats are heavy rainfall, flash flooding, high wind, and trees down. Scattered power outages are possible with wind gusts 20 to 25 MPH combined with intense rainfall rates. This is in fact for today into Friday use caution if you have to go out in it. Stay safe everyone.
